description:
Ever heard of books? 📚 NO cuz you robots are too busy doing who knows fucking what on your CELL (PRISON) PHONES. If you do the research, guess what? YOU can find the truth too 👍🏼 All you have to do is PUT IN THE WORK but this great awakening ISN'T FOR the lazy and ignorant 🚫 It's for the SMART AND WILLING WHO WANT TO SEEK KNOWLEDGE WE WEREN'T TAUGHT.
